org.jbei.ice.lib.net

Class RemoteAccessController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.net.RemoteAccessController

  • public class RemoteAccessController
extends Object
    Controller for access remote registries. This registries must be in a web of registries configuration with them since it requires an api key for communication.
    Author:
    Hector Plahar

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableFolders

        public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getAvailableFolders(long partnerId)
        Retrieves all folders with status "PUBLIC" on the registry partner with id specified in parameter
        Parameters:
        partnerId - unique (local) identifier for remote partner
        Returns:
        list of folders returned by the partner that are marked with status "PUBLIC", null on exception
